feedback_help_content:
ğŸ“ How to write feedback:

â€¢ Describe a problem: "Slow loading", "Profile setup is confusing"
â€¢ Suggest improvement: "Add new languages", "Improve interface"
â€¢ Ask a question: "How does matching work?", "When will new features be available?"

â° Response time: We respond within 24 hours
ğŸ“ Limitations: From 10 to 1000 characters

ğŸ’¡ Examples of good feedback:
â€¢ "Great bot! Would love to add Japanese language support"
â€¢ "Interface is intuitive, but navigation could be improved"
â€¢ "Quickly found a conversation partner for English practice"
â€¢ "Would like more notification settings"
